name: Principal Diagnosis Code
description: The diagnosis code identifying the diagnosis, condition, problem, or other reason for the admission/encounter/visit shown in the medical record to be chiefly responsible for the services provided.

additional: Depending upon the related Diagnosis Code Version:
eob.diagnosis[N].type[N].coding[N].display = 'The single medical diagnosis that is most relevant to the patient's chief complaint or need for treatment.'
fhirMapping.note: There may be more than one principal diagnosis at this point in time - this field as well as the diagnosisCode1.
